data.text:
Several days after the Selection Race. 
I spotted Copano Rickey on the training grounds.
data.processed:
<story>Several days after the Selection Race. 
<story>I spotted Copano Rickey on the training grounds.

data.text:
Haa, haa, huu, huu…… Wood, Fire, Soil, Gold, Be Blessed with Luck! 
Fire, Soil, Gold, Water, Be Blessed with Luck!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, huu, huu…… Wood, Fire, Soil, Gold, Be Blessed with Luck! 
<story>Fire, Soil, Gold, Water, Be Blessed with Luck!

data.text:
Huu…… Haahuuuu…… That should do it. 
Next, the wood chip course……!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Huu…… Haahuuuu…… That should do it. 
<story>Next, the wood chip course……!

data.text:
Ah, Trainer! Yeah, after such a disappointing result, 
I figured I needed to step up the training another level.
data.name: Copano Rickey

choices.text: Because of what Hokko Tarumae said?

data.processed:
<story>Ah, Trainer! Yeah, after such a disappointing result, 
<story>I figured I needed to step up the training another level.

data.text:
Eh!? No, no. I'm not doing this particularly 
because Tarumae told me to 『Do more training』.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Eh!? No, no. I'm not doing this particularly 
<story>because Tarumae told me to 『Do more training』.

data.text:
I do about this much everyday already☆ Feng Shui isn't something 
that can fulfill your wishes. It's something that can show you 
where to focus your effort!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I do about this much everyday already☆ Feng Shui isn't something 
<story>that can fulfill your wishes. It's something that can show you 
<story>where to focus your effort!

data.text:
―Where to focus your efforts. Judging by those 
words, it seems that Copano Rickey isn't an Uma 
Musume that solely relies on Feng Shui.
data.processed:
<story>―Where to focus your efforts. Judging by those 
<story>words, it seems that Copano Rickey isn't an Uma 
<story>Musume that solely relies on Feng Shui.

data.text:
It's not that there's been a change in how hard 
I'm going to work but, that huge loss from before……I 
felt I needed to do something about that!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>It's not that there's been a change in how hard 
<story>I'm going to work but, that huge loss from before……I 
<story>felt I needed to do something about that!

data.text:
I never thought that I wouldn't be able to hear the Voice of the 
Earth. Like this, there's no way I'll be able to help anyone out.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I never thought that I wouldn't be able to hear the Voice of the 
<story>Earth. Like this, there's no way I'll be able to help anyone out.

data.text:
"To help anyone out". That's the first time I've heard her say 
those words. It seems like Copano Rickey had some kind of hidden 
reason to keep running.

choices.text: Can we talk for a bit?
Can we talk for a bit?

data.processed:
<story>"To help anyone out". That's the first time I've heard her say 
<story>those words. It seems like Copano Rickey had some kind of hidden 
<story>reason to keep running.

data.text:
Yeah! Of course, as much as you want♪ 
I was just about to take a break anyways.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! Of course, as much as you want♪ 
<story>I was just about to take a break anyways.

data.text: And so we took a walk, heading to the park near Tracen Academy―
data.processed: <story>And so we took a walk, heading to the park near Tracen Academy―

data.text:
Oh, Rickey-chan! If it ain't Rickey-chan! 
Thanks for before!
data.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>Oh, Rickey-chan! If it ain't Rickey-chan! 
<story>Thanks for before!

data.text:
Ah, it's the old man from that Chinese restaurant! 
So, how'd it go after that?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Ah, it's the old man from that Chinese restaurant! 
<story>So, how'd it go after that?

data.text:
Yeah, it was a huge success! Just like Rickey-chan said, after 
changing the location of the tree in the garden, and making the 
ramen bowls orange……
data.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, it was a huge success! Just like Rickey-chan said, after 
<story>changing the location of the tree in the garden, and making the 
<story>ramen bowls orange……

data.text:
It feels like the atmosphere has changed, and the number of 
customers increased. And because of that, my bed ridden old man 
finally understands.
data.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>It feels like the atmosphere has changed, and the number of 
<story>customers increased. And because of that, my bed ridden old man 
<story>finally understands.

data.text:
I understand not wanting to change the way the place looked but…… 
sometimes it's important to have the courage to change, too.
data.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>I understand not wanting to change the way the place looked but…… 
<story>sometimes it's important to have the courage to change, too.

data.text:
With this, it looks like I'll be able to keep the 
old man's store going. Even the customers that have 
been coming since I was a kid were overjoyed.
data.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>With this, it looks like I'll be able to keep the 
<story>old man's store going. Even the customers that have 
<story>been coming since I was a kid were overjoyed.

data.text:
Waah, that's good! That's right, if the 
shop closed up, everyone would be unhappy too.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Waah, that's good! That's right, if the 
<story>shop closed up, everyone would be unhappy too.

data.text:
Rather than sitting and waiting, it's better to continue on! If I 
was able to give you the push you needed, even if it was only a 
little, then I'm glad!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Rather than sitting and waiting, it's better to continue on! If I 
<story>was able to give you the push you needed, even if it was only a 
<story>little, then I'm glad!

data.text:
Yeah, for the sake of my old man and our regulars, 
I'll be counting on you for more Feng Shui advice!
data.name: Chinese Restaurant Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, for the sake of my old man and our regulars, 
<story>I'll be counting on you for more Feng Shui advice!

data.text:
After bowing his head repeatedly, the 
Restaurant Employee took his leave.
data.processed:
<story>After bowing his head repeatedly, the 
<story>Restaurant Employee took his leave.

data.text:
―And just like that, Feng Shui can help people that 
are a little lost or find themselves at a standstill.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>―And just like that, Feng Shui can help people that 
<story>are a little lost or find themselves at a standstill.

data.text:
It was the same for me, and I've seen it for many other Uma 
Musume as well. It happens a lot, with just a little push from 
Feng Shui, things will work out.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>It was the same for me, and I've seen it for many other Uma 
<story>Musume as well. It happens a lot, with just a little push from 
<story>Feng Shui, things will work out.

data.text:
That's why I want more people to learn about Feng 
Shui! And I want everyone to be happy! To learn Feng 
Shui, avoid misfortune, and invite fortune!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>That's why I want more people to learn about Feng 
<story>Shui! And I want everyone to be happy! To learn Feng 
<story>Shui, avoid misfortune, and invite fortune!

data.text:
Therefore, I need to win in races so 
everyone can learn just how great it is♪
data.name: Copano Rickey

choices.text: Then you're doing this for everyone……

data.processed:
<story>Therefore, I need to win in races so 
<story>everyone can learn just how great it is♪

data.text:
Saying it's for everyone might be a bit of an exaggeration, 
but wouldn't you want anyone to be able to be happy?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Saying it's for everyone might be a bit of an exaggeration, 
<story>but wouldn't you want anyone to be able to be happy?

data.text:
But, well, if I'm the one losing, then it's not very convincing. 
I never thought that, during an important race, I'd be unable to 
hear the Voice of the Earth.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>But, well, if I'm the one losing, then it's not very convincing. 
<story>I never thought that, during an important race, I'd be unable to 
<story>hear the Voice of the Earth.

data.text:
Copano Rickey genuinely wanted to be able to help anyone. Along 
with being impressed with her, something weighed on my mind.

choices.text: What is that "Voice of the Earth"?

data.processed:
<story>Copano Rickey genuinely wanted to be able to help anyone. Along 
<story>with being impressed with her, something weighed on my mind.

data.text:
Voice of the Earth? Ah, even though I call it a voice, it's not 
like I really hear a voice, it's more like I just get a feeling.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Voice of the Earth? Ah, even though I call it a voice, it's not 
<story>like I really hear a voice, it's more like I just get a feeling.

data.text:
Ever since elementary school, I've been able to 
hear the "Voice of the Earth". Like during athletics 
competitions, if I focus during the race―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Ever since elementary school, I've been able to 
<story>hear the "Voice of the Earth". Like during athletics 
<story>competitions, if I focus during the race―

data.text:
『Run like this』, as if it was from the viewpoint of the Earth. 
The flow of qi, how to move around the next corner, I could 
understand it all in detail. That's why……!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>『Run like this』, as if it was from the viewpoint of the Earth. 
<story>The flow of qi, how to move around the next corner, I could 
<story>understand it all in detail. That's why……!

data.text:
I was able to win consecutively. By training my body while in 
harmony with nature, becoming one with all of creation, by 
continuing on the correct path, I could reach the goal first!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>I was able to win consecutively. By training my body while in 
<story>harmony with nature, becoming one with all of creation, by 
<story>continuing on the correct path, I could reach the goal first!

data.text:
But, with that previous Selection Race, it was 
difficult to hear that voice. Was it because 
of nerves, or lack of preparation? Hmmmmm……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>But, with that previous Selection Race, it was 
<story>difficult to hear that voice. Was it because 
<story>of nerves, or lack of preparation? Hmmmmm……

data.text:
Being in harmony with nature is part of Feng Shui, 
but I felt a kind of distance, and I guess it 
felt like I couldn't become one with it……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Being in harmony with nature is part of Feng Shui, 
<story>but I felt a kind of distance, and I guess it 
<story>felt like I couldn't become one with it……

data.text:
Copano Rickey was earnest but troubled. If the problem was being 
"Unable to feel nature" then I wanted to help her resolve it.

choices.text: Want to try going somewhere tomorrow?

data.processed:
<story>Copano Rickey was earnest but troubled. If the problem was being 
<story>"Unable to feel nature" then I wanted to help her resolve it.

data.text: Eh, going somewhere……Trainer, where to?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Eh, going somewhere……Trainer, where to?

data.text:
Waaah, a picnic～♪ As a change of pace, this might be best! 
How about I try yelling out to those mountains～?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Waaah, a picnic～♪ As a change of pace, this might be best! 
<story>How about I try yelling out to those mountains～?

data.text: Rickey☆ Lucky☆ So Happy～～～～!!!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Rickey☆ Lucky☆ So Happy～～～～!!!

data.text:
I brought Copano Rickey to the mountains. To figure 
out why she couldn't hear the Voice of the Earth, 
this was probably the ideal environment.
data.processed:
<story>I brought Copano Rickey to the mountains. To figure 
<story>out why she couldn't hear the Voice of the Earth, 
<story>this was probably the ideal environment.

data.text:
Yeah! In a place like this, it's easy to see the "Ley Lines". 
And you could say the flow of qi is easily discernible!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! In a place like this, it's easy to see the "Ley Lines". 
<story>And you could say the flow of qi is easily discernible!

data.text:
Yeah, Ley Lines! They often follow along ridges, 
and you can kind of feel the flow of qi through 
them. Those are ley lines. And then……!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, Ley Lines! They often follow along ridges, 
<story>and you can kind of feel the flow of qi through 
<story>them. Those are ley lines. And then……!

data.text:
And the exits of those Ley Lines are called "Power 
Spots". Where the mountain's ki flows down to the 
beach and gathers, it becomes a power spot.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>And the exits of those Ley Lines are called "Power 
<story>Spots". Where the mountain's ki flows down to the 
<story>beach and gathers, it becomes a power spot.

data.text: And if I focus here like this―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>And if I focus here like this―

data.text:
Today I can feel it properly. The ki from this "Power Spot". 
That swirling power, I can feel it all around me.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Today I can feel it properly. The ki from this "Power Spot". 
<story>That swirling power, I can feel it all around me.

data.text:
Even when I close my eyes― I can see the entire beach. 
I can hear the Voice of the Earth, and very clearly.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Even when I close my eyes― I can see the entire beach. 
<story>I can hear the Voice of the Earth, and very clearly.

data.text:
Hmmm, I'm in perfect condition. So it's not that something was 
wrong with my senses. But then why was I unable to hear it during 
that Selection Race……?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm, I'm in perfect condition. So it's not that something was 
<story>wrong with my senses. But then why was I unable to hear it during 
<story>that Selection Race……?

data.text:
I thought about it. If it's not her condition 
then…… the reason she could hear it on this 
"Beach" now, but not on the "Race Course".
data.processed:
<story>I thought about it. If it's not her condition 
<story>then…… the reason she could hear it on this 
<story>"Beach" now, but not on the "Race Course".

data.text:
Copano Rickey said that she would win consecutively 
at athletics events when she was young. Even on 
"School Grounds" she could hear that voice……
data.processed:
<story>Copano Rickey said that she would win consecutively 
<story>at athletics events when she was young. Even on 
<story>"School Grounds" she could hear that voice……

data.text:
On the "School Grounds" and "Beach" she could hear it, but on 
the "Race Course" she couldn't. Perhaps, that's it―
data.processed:
<story>On the "School Grounds" and "Beach" she could hear it, but on 
<story>the "Race Course" she couldn't. Perhaps, that's it―

data.text:
Clearly, in regards to Feng Shui, if there was 
a difference in those environments, then―
data.processed:
<story>Clearly, in regards to Feng Shui, if there was 
<story>a difference in those environments, then―

data.text: Trainer……? Is something wrong?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Trainer……? Is something wrong?

data.text: Might know what?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Might know what?

data.text: Eeeeeeeh, really?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Eeeeeeeh, really?

data.text:
And if my prediction is correct, 
then Copano Rickey―
data.processed:
<story>And if my prediction is correct, 
<story>then Copano Rickey―

data.text:
Will definitely be able to display her 
full power in the next Selection Race.
data.processed:
<story>Will definitely be able to display her 
<story>full power in the next Selection Race.

title: A Slump? Oh, Voice Of The Earth
